decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (D1; D2; D3; D4; D5; D6; D7; D8; D9. Received: 10/11/2016.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 2 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - The shed hereby approved shall only be used for storage purposes in connection with the on-going use of the site as an Accountant's Office (Use Class A2). The outbuilding shall not be used as office accommodation or as a self-contained residence without the permission of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Retrosepctive application for the erection of a shed to the rear garden of the office (Amended Description)
